g.text: Böhm et al. Retelling Climate Change Narratives
We thank our student research assistants Aleksander Heltne,
Vilde Lie, Ingvild Bahr, Nina Larsen, Henriette Lønnerød, and Ida
Wennerstrand for their help in analyzing the retelling data.
The Supplementary Material for this article can be found
